pistols.name: MP Special
pistols.desc: A reproduction of an old Imperial police revolver that uses 6 rounds of 8x20mm Old Service in moon clips.

pistols.name: FA Compact
pistols.desc: A compact, modified DAP-19C that feeds .357 DAP from a double-stack magazine.

pistols.name: FA Platinum
pistols.desc: A limited edition courtesy of the famed gunsmith Yalmun Noriho. It feeds .41 PAC.

pistols.name: Charger
pistols.desc: Amihailu's personal firearm, chambered in .458 Murenbi. Commissioned from the gunsmith Yalmun Noriho.

rifles.name: Varminter 1910
rifles.desc: An accurate lever-action plinker. Uses 6mm Brushmaster.

rifles.name: Fumihao Frontier
rifles.desc: A Galwi lever-gun pattern from the 1890s that uses the old .30 Government round.

rifles.name: Tanunjon 1909
rifles.desc: A famous and ubiquitous Galwi bolt-action rifle chambered in 8x57mm Imperial.

rifles.name: Yalmun Special 2X
rifles.desc: A frighteningly powerful O/U double rifle that uses a wildcat 12.7mm cartridge developed by Yalmun Noriho.
